```{r}

library("lattice")
library("mvtnorm")
library(boot)
```

```{r}
iris.data <- subset(iris, select = -Species)
means <- aggregate(iris.data, list(groups = iris$Species), mean)
means
covatiations<-by(iris.data, iris$Species, cov)
model_list <- list(cov = covatiations, means = means[, -1, drop = FALSE])
```
